name: Pumpkin Spice Paradise 2
description:
A quirky adventure sequel made in Bitsy for the Great Harvest Game Jam! Pumpkin Paradise 2 is set in the same world as its predecessor with new characters to meet and original locations to explore. The goal of the game is simple: collect 5 spices, and then bring them back to WizzyWig, where he gives you a final objective.

Controls: Arrow Keys [or WASD]

-Collect 5 Unique Spices
-Visit 7 Interesting Locations
-Interact with Strange Characters

Enjoy the Harvest Vibes
-----------------------------

Follow Firith Studio
